import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Footer from '../landing_page/footer' import Navbar from '../landing_page/navbar' import { BrowserRouter as Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom'; import Home from './home'; import MyCourses from './my_courses'; import Wishlists from './wishlists'; import Transactions from './transactions'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router'; const Dashboard = () => { let path = useLocation() return ( <>
